text: Allister Wences MacNeil (September 27, 1935 â€“ January 5, 2025) was a professional Canadian ice hockey player. He played Defence. He played for the Toronto Maple Leafs, Montreal Canadiens, Chicago Black Hawks, New York Rangers and the Pittsburgh Penguins between 1956 to 1970. MacNeil died on January 5, 2025 at his home in Calgary, Canada at the age of 89.Al MacNeil, long-time Flames coach, executive, dies at 89 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1935 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Toronto Maple Leafs players Category:Montreal Canadiens players Category:Chicago Blackhawks players Category:New York Rangers players Category:Pittsburgh Penguins players Category:Ice hockey people from Nova Scotia Category:Ice hockey people from Alberta Category:Sportspeople from Calgary
title: Al MacNeil
